body.p: Some argued that a net approach should be permitted when an entity retains an obligation to pay the entire amount of the benefits directly, but the obligation was considered unlikely to have any substantive effect in practice. IASC concluded that it would not be practicable to establish guidance of this kind that could be applied in a consistent manner.
